playernotifier.midnightconfig.title: Player Radar Config
playernotifier.midnightconfig.showChat.t: Show an alert in the chat when a player enters your chunks.
playernotifier.midnightconfig.showHUD.to: Show an alert above the hotbar when a player enters your chunks.
Play an alert sound when a player enters your chunks.
playernotifier.midnightconfig.timesToPla: The amount of times the alert "ding" sound will be played.
playernotifier.midnightconfig.soundInter:
How long to wait in between each "ding" sound in §9ticks§r.

Multiply seconds by 20 to get ticks.
playernotifier.midnightconfig.soundVolum: The volume of each "ding" sound as a percentage.
playernotifier.midnightconfig.soundPitch: The pitch of each "ding" sound as a percentage.
playernotifier.blacklist.invalid_uuid: Invalid UUID format. Make sure the UUID is separated by hyphens.
playernotifier.blacklist.already: This player is already in the blacklist. No changes were made.
playernotifier.blacklist.not: This player is already not in the blacklist. No changes were made.
playernotifier.blacklist.uuid_already: This UUID is already in the blacklist. No changes were made.
playernotifier.blacklist.uuid_not: This UUID is already not in the blacklist. No changes were made.
playernotifier.whitelist.invalid_uuid: Invalid UUID format. Make sure the UUID is separated by hyphens.
playernotifier.whitelist.already: This player is already in the whitelist. No changes were made.
playernotifier.whitelist.not: This player is already not in the whitelist. No changes were made.
playernotifier.whitelist.uuid_already: This UUID is already in the whitelist. No changes were made.
playernotifier.whitelist.uuid_not: This UUID is already not in the whitelist. No changes were made.
playernotifier.mode.blacklist: The radar mode is currently set to blacklist
playernotifier.mode.whitelist: The radar mode is currently set to whitelist
playernotifier.mode.set.blacklist: The radar mode is now set to blacklist
playernotifier.mode.set.whitelist: The radar mode is now set to whitelist
playernotifier.mode.already_blacklist: The radar mode is already set to blacklist
playernotifier.mode.already_whitelist: The radar mode is already set to whitelist
